price: dan (juga) Qārūn, Firʻawn , dan Hāmān.  Dan sesungguhnya telah datang kepada mereka Musa dengan (membawa bukti-bukti) keterangan-keterangan yang nyata.  Akan tetapi, mereka berlaku sombong di (muka) bumi dan tiadalah mereka orang-orang yang luput (dari kehancuran itu).
arabic: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqārūna wafir'ʿawna wahāmāna walaqad jāahum mūsā bil-bayināti fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi wamā kānū sābiqīna
